```{stata s4_input3, eval = F}

est store m1 
esttab m1, stats( r2 N,fmt(a3)) mti noeqlines compress nolines brack nonumbers replace obslast   cells("b(fmt(a3)) se(fmt(a3)) p(fmt(3))")
```
